title: Strengthening Systems Design Competencies: Pandemic Learning Gap Analysis and Digital-Based Self-Directed Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced-level specialized knowledge in the field and extensive practical experience
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can explain at least three major learning gap areas in elementary science (mathematics/science) during the pandemic.
Learners can develop self-directed learning plans using digital tools (online lecture platforms, educational apps, etc.).
Learners can design solutions to address learning gaps by applying family support and peer collaboration strategies.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
